title: Amor Towles on A Gentleman in Moscow and the Writer's Craft
description: Author Amor Towles talks about his book, A Gentleman in Moscow, with EconTalk host Russ Roberts. Along the way they discuss the craft of writing, the wellsprings of persistence, and Towles's reading habits.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
content:encoded: Author Amor Towles talks about his book, A Gentleman in Moscow, with EconTalk host Russ Roberts. Along the way they discuss the craft of writing, the wellsprings of persistence, and Towles's reading habits.
